resources.name: TheTavernKnightsBarracks - Justin Aucoin
resources.description: Recorded video lessons in Italian Rapier from instructor Justin Aucoin.

resources.name: Fundamentals of Italian Rapier - David Coblentz and Dori Coblentz
resources.description: A modern instructional manual containing both theoretical foundations and practical exercises for those interested in studying 17th century Italian rapier.

resources.name: David Coblentz and Dori Coblentz
resources.description: Recorded video lessons in Italian Rapier from instructors Dori and David Coblentz of the Decatur School of Arms.

resources.name: Fighting with the German Longsword - Christian Tobler
resources.description: A how to guide for learning the German longsword tradition based on the 14th century teachings of Johannes Liechtenauer.

resources.name: The Medieval Longsword - Guy Windsor
resources.description: A complete modern guide and system for training medieval longsword, drawing from 15th century manual Il Fiore di Battaglia, written by Fiore di Liberi in 1410.

resources.name: The Duellist's Companion - Guy Windsor
resources.description: A modern interpretation and training guide for the 17th century rapier system created by Capoferro.

resources.name: Guy Windsor
resources.description: A listing of the works of Guy Windsor, a well known Historical European Martial Arts instructor and researcher.  His work covers largely the Italian tradition across a number of weapons, including lonsword, rapier and dagger.
